analysis.description: Leadmagnet-Quiz-Mitochondrien is a niche lead-generation quiz experience that educates users about mitochondrial health while capturing rich, consented contact and profiling data. It turns health-curious traffic into segmented, high-intent leads that can be nurtured into premium wellness product or program sales.

valueProposition: Convert cold traffic into qualified leads via an engaging quiz themed around mitochondrial health and fatigue-related issues.
Segment users by symptoms, goals, and awareness level to trigger targeted email funnels and higher-converting offers.
Provide a white-label, reusable quiz asset that health brands can plug into existing funnels, landing pages, and ad campaigns.

customerSegments.name: Functional medicine and naturopathic clinics
pain_points: Difficulty filling high-ticket programs and consultations with qualified, pre-educated patients
Limited internal capacity to build conversion-optimized quiz funnels for lead generation

customerSegments.name: Supplement and wellness product brands (mitochondria/energy focus)
pain_points: Need scalable, compliant list-building mechanisms to feed email and SMS marketing
Poor differentiation and low engagement on standard landing pages and static lead magnets

customerSegments.name: Health coaches specializing in fatigue, burnout, and longevity
pain_points: Reliance on referrals and social content without a predictable lead-generation engine
Lack of technical skills to design and optimize interactive quiz funnels

revenueStreams.source: SaaS subscription for hosted quiz funnel (builder, hosting, analytics, integrations)
Done-for-you funnel setup and customization for individual brands/clinics
White-label licensing of the quiz template for agencies serving health & wellness clients
